about_the_game:
"O! Holy Knight" invites you to embark on an exhilarating journey into a medieval fantasy world teeming with peril and adventure. Assume the role of the Holy Knight, tasked with leading a formidable squad of warriors through treacherous landscapes, defeating relentless waves of monstrous foes.



Ascend to the helm of tactical mastery as you control the intricate formations of your medieval squad. Direct knights, archers, and mages with precision, orchestrating a dance of blades and magic on the battlefield. Harness the power of strategic formation to exploit enemy weaknesses, creating an unbreakable wall against the relentless waves of monstrous adversaries.




Celebrate every hard-won victory as your squad gains invaluable experience, unlocking a myriad of skills and abilities. Tailor your unit's prowess, creating powerful synergies that complement your meticulously crafted formations. Evolve your strategy dynamically, ensuring your squad stands resilient against the ever-intensifying challenges.




Immerse yourself in the stunning, high-fidelity world of "O! Holy Knight" with captivating cell-shaded visuals. Watch as your medieval warband comes to life in vibrant, toon-rendered detail. Every knight, archer, and mage is meticulously crafted to deliver a visually striking experience, ensuring that every formation and battle unfolds with flair.
